headline: Fortinet Recognized as a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for SASE Platforms
summary: Fortinet believes its long-term vision of converging networking and security is validated by being named a Leader in both the 2025 SASE Platforms and 2024 SD-WAN Gartner Magic Quadrant reportsSUNNYVALE, Calif., July 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Fortinet® (NASDAQ: FTNT), the global cybersecurity leader driving the convergence of networking and security, today announced it has been recognized as a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for SASE Platforms and ranked #1 in the Secure Branch Net

headline: Mimecast Appoints Cybersecurity Leader Patrice Perche to Board of Directors to Bolster Enterprise Growth and Global Expansion
summary: LEXINGTON, Mass., July 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Mimecast, a global cybersecurity leader redefining how organizations secure human risk through precision-engineered AI, today announced the appointment of Patrice Perche to its Board of Directors. Patrice is a long-time cybersecurity and technology executive with a proven track record of driving growth and innovation in the industry and helping organizations worldwide navigate the complexities of today’s threat landscape. Patrice joined Fortine

headline: Fortinet Stock Shows Rising Market Leadership: Earns 84 Relative Strength Rating
summary: Fortinet shows improving price performance, earning an upgrade to its IBD Relative Strength Rating from 79 to 84.
